page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
page.content: With the exception of the introduction by the {Reverend E.Jones}and the two pages of {W.Pearse's Devonshire {dialect}with translation the texts are the result of the research, initiative and compilation of some of the pupils of {Buckfastleigh Primary School.}The chidren have been soley responsible for entering the data into the computer.They are{Kate Amos, Victoria {Bailey,Rebekah Chapman, Jennifer {Grieveson,Lynsay Gill,Kardine {Jaworski,Clair Knowling,Verity Rake, {Phoebe Thompson_Coon,Helen Voisey, {Marcus Allen,Matthew Crimp,Leon {Cummings,Lee Dance,Marc Dolley,Barry {Evans,Daniel Full,Robin Hatch,Nicholas {Kerswell,Ross McGuire,Stephen Miller, {Terry Powney,Peter Rushworh,Mark {Smith,Andrew Wells,Leon Whitear and {Teresa Manning.
